category.name: Test Case 3, Follows, Parent, Modifies, Uses for two consecutives while loop

id.comment: Which while loop follows another while loop?

query.querystr: while w1, w2; select w2 such that Follows(w1,w2);

id.comment: Which is/are the statements following statement #2?

query.querystr: stmt s; select s such that Follows (2,s);

id.comment: Which is/are the statement(s) following another statement?

query.querystr: stmt s1,s2; select s2 such that Follows (s1,s2);

id.comment: Which is the statement followed by other statements?

query.querystr: stmt s1; select s1 such that Follows (s1,_);

id.comment: Select all statements if there exists a follow relationship

query.querystr: stmt s1; select s1 such that Follows (_,_);

id.comment: Which is/are the statement(s) following another statement?

query.querystr: stmt s1; select s1 such that Follows (_,s1);

id.comment: Which is/are the assignment(s) following another assignment?

query.querystr: assign a1,a2; select a2 such that Follows (a1,a2);

id.comment: Which is/are the statement(s) followed by statement 3?

query.querystr: stmt s; select s such that Follows*(s,3);

id.comment: Which is/are the statement(s) following statement 1?

query.querystr: stmt s; select s such that Follows* (1,s);
stmt s1,s2; select s2 such that Follows* (s1,s2);

id.comment: Which are the statements followed by other statements?

query.querystr: stmt s1; select s1 such that Follows* (s1,_);

id.comment: Select all statements is there exists a follow relationship.

query.querystr: stmt s1; select s1 such that Follows* (_,_);

id.comment: Which are the statements following another statements?

query.querystr: stmt s1; select s1 such that Follows* (_,s1);

id.comment: Which are the assignments following another assignments?

query.querystr: assign a1,a2; select a2 such that Follows* (a1,a2);
